Kathi Croston Sottosanti

Edit Profile
Age:55 yrs
Height: 67 Inches
Location:New Jersey, 07609, United States
Send Email

Biography

In her first powerlifting meet in the Master s 50-54 148 weight class Kathi Sottosanti set the New jersey State and National records in the squat, bench press, deadlift and total. Kathi also set state record for novice deadlift in the Master s 50-54 148 weight class.
